hero.description: Your all-in-one solution for managing meetings, tasks, and events. Create multiple calendars, invite collaborators, and stay organized across all time horizons.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to stay organized
features.description: Powerful features designed to help you manage time efficiently and collaborate seamlessly

calendarViews.title: Multiple Calendar Views
calendarViews.description: Switch between week, month, and year views. Track week numbers and manage multiple calendars simultaneously.

categories.title: Smart Event Categories
categories.description: Organize events by type: arrangements, reminders, and tasks. Each with custom functionality and duration settings.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Share calendars, invite friends via email, and manage team permissions for shared calendars.

holidays.title: Holiday Integration
holidays.description: Built-in calendar with national holidays based on your region, automatically synchronized.

quickEvents.title: Quick Event Creation
quickEvents.description: Create events directly from the calendar interface or use detailed forms for more complex scheduling.

privacy.title: Privacy Controls
privacy.description: Manage sharing permissions and event visibility with granular access controls.

cta.description: Join thousands of users who are already managing their time better with Chronos.

footer.description: Chronos is your all-in-one solution for organizing meetings, tasks, and events. Our platform helps you manage time effectively with features like multiple calendar views, smart event categorization, and team collaboration tools.
